title: Brand spend on eSports sponsorship and advertising worldwide 2015 to 2020
summary: This is a line chart with an x axis representing Year and a y axis representing Spending in million U.S. dollars, containing a total of 4 data points.
Overall Spending in million U.S. dollars has increased over the Year.
Spending in million U.S. dollars is slightly increasing from 2015 to 2020.
The steepest increase occurs in between the Year 2017 and 2020.
The highest Spending in million U.S. dollars, of value 1220.0 was reached at Year 2020
Minimum Spending in million U.S. dollars about 230.0 was reached at Year 2015

max_summary: This is a line chart with an x axis representing Year and a y axis representing Spending in million U.S. dollars, containing a total of 4 data points.
In general Spending in million U.S. dollars has rose over the Year.
Spending in million U.S. dollars is slightly increasing from 2015 to 2020.

The line rapidly increased by 135.98% from Year 2017 to 2020.
